definition: powder/cosmetic face powder/food prepared from starch/noodles or pasta made from any kind of flour/whitewash/white/pink

sentences.english: The blood amylase is usually elevated as a result of parotitis.
sentences.chinese: 腮腺炎常引起血清淀粉酶增高。

sentences.english: These results implied that exogenous amylase had a carry-over effect on the endogenous enzyme activity in broilers.
sentences.chinese: 提示外源淀粉酶对内源酶活性的影响有后续效应。

sentences.english: It is suggested that the synthesis of amylase in morphine dependent rat pancreas may be inhibited.
sentences.chinese: 提示吗啡成瘾大鼠胰淀粉酶合成受到抑制。

sentences.english: The correct formula for the determination of pancreatic amylase was established.
sentences.chinese: 并推导出胰淀粉酶的校正公式。

sentences.english: Objective To search for the optimal processing procedure and physicochemical properties of Endothelium corneum amylase.
sentences.chinese: 目的寻找鸡内金淀粉酶的最佳炮制工艺和理化性质。

sentences.english: The tumor cells were surrounded by PAS-positive, diastase-resistant membrane.
sentences.chinese: PAS染色示瘤细胞周围绕以耐淀粉酶膜。

sentences.english: It is suggested that the synthesis of amylase in morphine dependent rat pancreas may be inh…
sentences.chinese: 提示吗啡成瘾大鼠胰淀粉酶合成受到抑制。

sentences.english: Objective In order to realize the false positive of pancreatic amylase.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解胰淀粉酶测定的假阳性问题。

sentences.english: Amylase content of pancreatic tissue in morphine dependent rats was lower than that of normal rats.
sentences.chinese: 吗啡成瘾大鼠胰腺组织中淀粉酶含量降低。
